details.travel: Hours pass beneath a low ceiling of grey cloud, the kind that blurs the line between afternoon and evening.
details.world: The road ahead is silent — abandoned cars slumped at odd angles, fences tilting like they’ve given up standing.
details.survivors: {SURVIVOR1} and {SURVIVOR2} feel the weight of the stillness, their steps dragging with a quiet, shared fatigue.
details.moment: Thunder murmurs somewhere far off, promising a storm that never quite arrives.
details.tone: Calm but heavy — the kind of day that stretches thin and frays at the edges.

details.travel: A long, gentle stretch of road opens before them, offering a rare sense of ease.
details.world: Grass sways along the verges, untouched and unbothered. A faded sign leans westward, pointing toward a place no one keeps anymore.
details.survivors: Muscles ache, but the empty road gives them a moment to breathe without looking over their shoulders.
details.moment: They drift past an old picnic area — broken tables, peeling paint, memories of normal days.
details.tone: A fragile moment of normality, brief but real.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} suggests pausing here to rest their legs
They decide to keep moving before the quiet starts to feel suspicious

details.travel: The road curves gently through tall grass and wildflowers reclaiming the edge of the asphalt.
details.world: A small memorial appears — photos warped by sun, plastic flowers bleached pale, a stuffed toy hardened by weather.
details.survivors: The sight slows their steps, stirring quiet thoughts neither chooses to voice.
details.moment: A soft breeze drifts across their path, carrying dust and a faint hint of old earth.
details.tone: Somber and reflective — a reminder of how long the world has been broken.

details.travel: A dip in the road reveals several cars abandoned at awkward angles, the scene frozen mid-flight.
details.world: Most have been gutted by scavengers, but one still holds a few scattered containers rolling in the footwell.
details.survivors: {SURVIVOR1} approaches first while {SURVIVOR2} watches the treeline, but only wind answers.
details.moment: A half-full bottle of clean water rests against the seat, untouched.
details.tone: A brief stroke of luck — small, but enough to lift spirits.

choices.text: Take the water — clean finds like this are rare
{SURVIVOR1} decides to leave it, uneasy about how strange it feels to find something intact

details.travel: A thin drizzle settles over everything, soft enough not to sting but relentless enough to soak.
details.world: Puddles form in cracks and potholes, mirroring the washed-out sky.
details.survivors: Their clothes cling damply, but the cool air keeps their thoughts sharp and alert.
details.moment: A sudden burst of wings draws their eyes upward as a flock of birds takes flight.
details.tone: Slow and damp — a day that wears patience thin but keeps them moving.

details.travel: The miles drag by in a straight, unbroken line.
details.world: Old evacuation debris litters the road — backpacks split open, posters flaking apart, crates crushed under tires.
details.survivors: Frayed nerves lead to a sharp, pointless argument between {SURVIVOR1} and {SURVIVOR2}.
details.moment: It ends quickly, but the tension hangs in the air for long minutes afterward.
details.tone: Human and raw — exhaustion scraping away at patience.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} breaks the silence and talks it through
They walk in silence until the moment passes on its own

details.travel: The road narrows as it winds toward a cluster of worn-down shelters.
details.world: A collapsed tent, rusted cookware, and the remains of a fire pit hint at a camp long abandoned.
details.survivors: No footprints, no movement — just the quiet echo of a place once lived in.
details.moment: {SURVIVOR2} spots a sealed protein bar half-buried beside the cold ashes.
details.tone: Eerie but oddly comforting — traces of the past without present danger.

choices.text: Take the protein bar — every scrap helps
{SURVIVOR1} decides to leave it untouched out of respect

details.travel: The long day settles into evening, the sky painted in soft oranges and fading gold.
details.world: Shadows stretch across the cracked asphalt as sunlight slips behind distant trees.
details.survivors: Their legs ache, but the quiet of the evening carries a surprising calm.
details.moment: They pause for a moment, watching the sun sink and remembering the world before.
details.tone: Warm and quiet — a rare emotional breather.

details.travel: Mile after mile passes with little change in scenery.
details.world: Grass grows through shattered pavement, slowly reclaiming what was once a steady highway.
details.survivors: Fatigue pulls heavily at their limbs and thoughts, wearing them down like sandpaper.
details.moment: A brief stop to stretch eases the worst of the ache.
details.tone: Slow and weary — but they keep pushing forward.

choices.text: {SURVIVOR1} suggests resting longer than usual, just this once
{SURVIVOR2} urges them to push through before they lose momentum

details.travel: The road bends past a scattered cluster of old houses, roofs caved in or stripped bare.
details.world: A single curtain stirs in the wind, snapping {SURVIVOR1}'s attention upward for a tense heartbeat.
details.survivors: Nothing follows — just nerves playing tricks — but both stay sharper afterward.
details.moment: They move on, alert to every small sound in the empty distance.
details.tone: A flicker of tension in an otherwise quiet stretch.

details.travel: Morning sun filters through thinning mist, turning the world pale gold.
details.world: The air smells clean — damp earth, sap, and a hint of pine drifting from nearby trees.
details.survivors: A good night’s rest shows in their steps, lighter and more sure than the day before.
details.moment: Two deer cross the road ahead, stopping long enough to watch before disappearing into brush.
details.tone: Gentle and reassuring — the world isn’t entirely lost.

details.travel: A narrow walking trail merges briefly with the road before fading back into the tree line.
details.world: A torn satchel lies half-buried in leaves and dirt, straps frayed but contents still inside.
details.survivors: {SURVIVOR1} checks the area — no tracks, no sound but the rustle of brush.
details.moment: Inside, a sealed energy packet waits untouched by animals or time.
details.tone: A small but welcome stroke of fortune.

choices.text: Take the energy packet — no reason to waste it
Leave it in case someone comes back for it
